keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sharron Sumner is campaigning to stop Thames Water from polluting the river with raw sewage.
Sharron set up the 'Tree Assembly' to protect our trees. Ancient woodland in Chessington has been lost and 1,000 trees were felled in just the last year.
Sharron is campaigning to get the council to reveal developers' plans for precious nature reserves like Seething Wells and Tolworth Court Farm.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives can't win in Kingston and Surbiton

issues.brexitEurope: Some things are even bigger than Brexit. This must be the climate emergency election.
issues.environment: Climate change and biodiversity loss doesn’t just happen in far off places. Our local environment is under threat too. Sharron Sumner is leading the fight locally. It’s time to put the planet and our borough first by voting Green.

community.content: Sharron is campaigning to get the council to reveal developers' plans for precious nature reserves like Seething Wells and Tolworth Court Farm.

examples: Ancient woodland in Chessington has been lost and 1,000 trees were felled in just the last year.
The Conservative vote has slumped from 39% (2015) to 8% (2019).
Climate change and biodiversity loss doesn’t just happen in far off places. Our local environment is under threat too.
Some things are even bigger than Brexit. This must be the climate emergency election.
Sharron Sumner is campaigning to stop Thames Water from polluting the river with raw sewage.
Sharron set up the 'Tree Assembly' to protect our trees.
Sharron is campaigning to get the council to reveal developers' plans for precious nature reserves like Seething Wells and Tolworth Court Farm.
Some things are even bigger than Brexit. This must be the climate emergency election.
The Conservatives can't win in Kingston and Surbiton.

examples: Sharron Sumner is leading the fight locally.
